title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Rick, a gym trainer, keeps track of the daily calories consumed by a person in a week. He records the calorie details in a one-dimensional array. The given values are in kilocalories.



Write a Python program to perform the following operations on the given array:
● Insert a new value into the array.
● Modify the wrong entry in the position calories[3].
● Pop the last value from the array.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
